svt_i2c_master_rd_7bit_sr_rd_10bit_randdata_sequence Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_master_rd_7bit_sr_rd_10bit_randdata_sequence:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This sequence creates a scenario as following :
1. Read command,7-bit addressing, repeated start condition, random data with User defined data size followed by
2. Read command,10-bit addressing, user defined repeated start/stop condition, random data with User defined data size

Body of the sequence executes as follows

  • Create handles of primitive level sequences

  • Declares its local attributes

  • Receives the values of attributes of class from config db and if the values are not set through config db, then
    it takes randomized values.

  • Assigns received value of class attributes to its local attributes

  • Execute two primitive sequences to generate packets with configured address,data_size and sr_or_p_gen for both sequnces.
